definition: Vessels designed to hold, store, or prepare food and beverages

positive_examples: She poured the soup into a large pot to heat it up
The wine was stored in cases in the cellar
He opened a can of soda with his lunch
The sauce pan contained the simmering marinara
Beer cans were stacked in the refrigerator
The chef used a double boiler to melt the chocolate
negative_examples: She stored documents in a filing cabinet
The shipping container held electronics from overseas
He packed his clothes in a suitcase for the trip
The toolbox contained screwdrivers and hammers
Books were arranged in the bookcase
The jewelry box held her grandmother's rings
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: StorageContainer, ShippingContainer, Toolbox, Luggage
